byline.contributor: Brian X. Chen and Mike Isaac contributed reporting.

abstract: Apple hopes to introduce car product of some kind, either self-driving, electric or combination of two, by 2020; project is cloaked in secrecy but closely watched by others in software and automobile industries.
lead_paragraph: Apple is still working out whether it will make a self-driving car, an electric car 0r a combination of the two, a person with knowledge of the product said.

headline.main: Apple Presses Ahead With Efforts to Create Car, Though Big Issues Remain
headline.print_headline: Apple Presses Ahead With Efforts to Create Car, Though Big Issues Remain

snippet: Apple is still working out whether it will make a self-driving car, an electric car 0r a combination of the two, a person with knowledge of the product said.
